Type(s) of content in package:
Projects and PDFs

Since 2008, MRIP has funded survey improvement projects and survey program reviews in all regions of the U.S. and its Territories. Projects span everything from utilizing electronic reporting tools to mail surveys to increasing precision of estimates. On this page, you can find all funded projects since 2008, read project plans, final reports, and monthly updates.
recommended_approach: loop through iframed data content panes and download pdfs for each project
